ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: Senior software engineer with 10 years of experience. With a long experience on startups and fast paced environments, I am equipped with the tools to deliver high quality products and accompany a client to all phases of their project
ABOUT_ME.EXTRA: I have worked in a multitude of sectors like medical (cardiologs sold to Philips in 2022), oil & gas and observability, therefore I can adapt to any domain and deliver a great product

HEARTBEAT_ANALYSIS.TITLE: Heartbeat Analysis
HEARTBEAT_ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Rendering of multiple strips of electrocardiogram leads

SAMPLES.TITLE: Sample Projects
SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Have a look at some samples of my previous experiences
SAMPLES.POSTSCRIPT: All visualizations are completely custom made

GARMIN_SLEEP_DATA.TITLE: Garmin sleep data
GARMIN_SLEEP_DATA.DESCRIPTION: A graph that displays sleep data coming from a garmin smartwatch. It shows the sleep and wake up times along with the total hours slept

SCALED_SCATTER_PLOT.TITLE: Scaled Scatter Plot
SCALED_SCATTER_PLOT.DESCRIPTION: A scatter plot that displays millions of data points in the browser with WebGL. Use the slider to modify the number of points rendered

STOCK_DATA.TITLE: Stock Market Data
STOCK_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Visualisation of the daily value of the selected stock for the last 5 years

F_SHAPE.TITLE: WebGL Rotation, translation and scaling
F_SHAPE.DESCRIPTION: A sample of a basic webGL model with viewport interactions

HEART_3D.TITLE: Heart 3D
HEART_3D.DESCRIPTION: A display of a 3D rendered heart with basic viewport interactions

KEYS_CONFIGURATION.ROTATE: Left mouse to orbit around object
KEYS_CONFIGURATION.ROTATE_LIGHT: Shft + mouse move to orbit light around object
